name: muzzy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a person) confused and unable to think clearly because of tiredness, illness, alcohol, or drugs, or (of a situation, plans, etc.) not clear or well explained: Feeling muzzy from the blow on his head, he got up very slowly. Until a week ago, the group's objectives were slightly muzzy.
